summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Magic Wand Makeup Brushes Set - 5pcs Wizard Wand Makeup Brushes Foundation Blending Blush Eyeshadow Face Lip Powder Brush Beauty Tools (New-Bronze) Review Date: 2020/08/04 Store: rongji jewelry Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'rongji jewelry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, Lip, For Blush, For Setting Powder, For Foundation, Eyebrow', 'Color': 'New-Bronze', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '5', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 3.03 x 1.14 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'makeup brushes', 'UPC': '793610791245', 'Manufacturer': 'YUNXIAN'} Review Text: WOW! I was so surprised when I took these out of the package. They are very sturdy and look amazing. I wasn't expecting them to be as heavy as they were, but they really are pieces of art. There were a few loose hairs, but once those fell out (as most brushes do), they worked great. The carrying case they came with was also very cute. These are perfect for any Harry Potter fan. I am still so happy with how great these are. Review Title: Quality! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Maya Mari Hydrating Argan Oil Shampoo – Rich in Nutrients, Restores Moisture & Shine, 32 oz Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: MAYA MARI Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAYA MARI', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Curly Hair', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 10 inches; 1.94 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'MMAROILSP', 'UPC': '850004068267'} Review Text: I love the pump that this shampoo comes with. It's great to easily add the product to your hand while showering. This is also a nice big size for the price.

The shampoo is a bit watery, but it does lather very nicely and my hair feels smooth and silky after using it. I feel like I can use this everyday without drying out my hair. The shampoo smells really nice and I love the scent - it's not too strong. I had to use maybe two pumps to fully cover my hair while showering. Review Title: Love the pump Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers, 22 Sheets Butterfly Nail Sticker DIY Nail Decals, 2 Set Butterfly Nail Glitter Holographic Stickers Reflected Butterfly Designs for Nails Supply Review Date: 2020/10/24 Store: B bangcool Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Surface Recommendation nail': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Shape Irregular': '', 'Brand': 'B bangcool', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Pattern': 'Insects', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: Overall these stickers are very cute, and they stick on the nail easily. I feel like some of the stickers are very blurry, and it's hard to see what exactly the details are, which is a bit disappointing. The sticker sets also come from different brands, and they have a few different wrappers for each sticker. Review Title: Very cute, some stickers are "blurry" Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/11/06 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: This body wash is very potent and smells great. The pump is easy to use and my skin feels great after using it. There is also a lot of product in this, so I will be getting a lot of use out of it.

This came arrived and the safety cap was cracked, so it leaked out of the top and was a bit of a mess to clean up. There wasn't too much of product loss, but it still was annoying to clean up. Review Title: Smells Great! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Review Date: 2020/12/06 Store: Kneipp Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} Review Text: I have been enjoying this body foam. The smell isn't too overwhelming, and honestly I could use a bit more smell. It foams up really well, and glides on the skin. You can use not a lot and still cover your entire body. It washes off nicely, and you don't really smell it afterward. I have been using this for about a week and the container hasn't rusted or anything either, which is something that tends to happen with products in a metal container. I wish there was a way to know how much was left, so I know when to get a new one, but overall I am happy with this body wash. Review Title: Smells Great, Good Foaming Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2020/12/14 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'} Review Text: I am really impressed with this scrunchie. I have tried to use the invisibobble before, but I have very curly hair and my hair would always get caught in them, even if it did hold my hair up all day. I was so excited to give this a try. It is my new favorite hair accessory. The velvet is very smooth and it grips onto my hair all day. When I take it down, I don't have a very noticeable crease, and it also doesn't tear my hair out. I wish I had 100 of these in every color, I'm now a fan! Review Title: LOVE THIS Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Biutee Nail Stamping Plates 5pcs Templates With Stamper Scraper Set Nail Art Plates set animal flower Christmas halloween design Review Date: 2020/12/27 Store: Biutee Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 5.75 x 1.18 inches; 5.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TOOL-AT-755', 'Manufacturer': 'Biutee'} Review Text: I have tried and tried again for this to work, but I cannot for the life of me figure out how to use this. I have watched videos, tutorials, and spent hours trying these plates to get something, but I can't figure it out. I used different types of nail polishes, waited different amounts of times, and even used a stamper from another set (that also doesn't work) and the nail polish does not go onto the stamper. I feel like I see a lot of videos online of these working, but this is my second set and my second try, and it still does not work for me. Review Title: Did not work Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count Review Date: 2021/01/17 Store: SOOAE Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: I was expecting some larger bubbles than this mask gave me. I kept it on a bit longer than the recommended 3 minutes to see if the bubbles would get any larger, but they didn't. I think it worked well, but I think that the gimmick isn't worth what you get. My face felt pretty good afterward, but it wasn't anything special. This may be cooler to a younger demographic, but I would not get this again. Review Title: Underwhelming Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Steamer with Portable Mini Cold Facial Mister, Face Steamer for Facial Deep Cleaning, Nano Ionic Face Hot Steaming Machine for Home Facials Personal Moisturizing Skincare Beauty Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: ROSEFEAST Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Brand': 'ROSEFEAST', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Cold,Moisturizing,Relaxing,Clean,Aromatherapy', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 7.87 x 4.57 inches; 1.57 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'ROSEFEAST'} Review Text: I absolutely love this little facial steamer. It's a great size, and heats up the water very quickly. I also like the tools that this comes with. I feel like the headband is a touch too small for my head, but it is very cute. After using it, my skin felt hydrated, and it really opened up my pores. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I wish the cord was a bit longer and thinner. I have to use an extension cord to use it at my makeup desk. Review Title: Obsessed Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Avajar Aqua A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women and Men| Moisturizing Face Mask | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: This mask was easy to open and place on my face. The mask also did not slide while on my face. There weren't a lot of flaps that are hard to manage. My skin felt moisturized after using these, and my skin looked very hydrated. I felt that there was enough product on the mask, and it didn't feel overly wet. I would get these again. Review Title: Very moisturizing Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spiral Hair Ties (Gradient Coffee,9 Pcs), Coil Hair Ties for Thick Hair, Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women , No Crease Hair Ties, Phone Cord Hair Ties for all Hair Types with Plastic Spiral Review Date: 2021/03/15 Store: QIUTIMIY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'QIUTIMIY', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '9'} Review Text: I have pretty curly hair and I still haven't gotten these to work. My boyfriend uses this in his very straight hair and he has no issues. It holds his hair, doesn't leave a bump, and he likes how they look overall. I wish I could get these to work for my hair, but I do not have any luck. I'm happy that I have someone who can use it and enjoys it, but it's just not a product for me. Review Title: Not for curly hair Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fascy Facial Mask Beauty Treatment 5 Packs 3 Step Mask, Korean Facial Skincare Mask, All Natural Moisturizing Facial Mask Skin Beauty Treatment with Eye Cream, Skin Rejuvenation Facial Mask Review Date: 2021/03/24 Store: Fascy Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fascy', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Centella Asiatica', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 4.88 x 0.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} Review Text: This packaging is completely in Korean, which is fine, but I wish they included an instruction card for each step. I had to use a translating app to figure out what each pouch was.

The first time I used this product, I used it wrong because I used step 3 first, but that was because there is a big "step 3" on the front of the pouch. My skin felt good after using it the right way, but it's just confusing packaging. The face mask was very difficult to unwrap, which is very frustrating when you are trying to relax with some self care. I don't think I would get these again, but I will use up the rest of the masks that I have. Review Title: A little much Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff Review Date: 2021/05/02 Store: Beeager Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Color': 'Yellow,Gray,White', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Beeager', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 3.98 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Review Text: I was really happy with the performance of this scrunchie stand. It's well made and it holds a lot of scrunchies. I also really like the scrunchies that came with the stand. This would make a perfect gift for anyone that needs an easy way to store scrunchies and hairties. Review Title: Well made Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Short Straight Bob Wigs with Bangs Synthetic 1B/Blue Straight Wigs for Cosplay Wig or Daily Party Use Review Date: 2021/05/02 Store: SENSAIRUITE Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'SENSAIRUITE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '14.44 x 9.99 x 1.92 inches; 7.2 Ounces'} Review Text: I really liked this wig. It looked natural, and it was easy to take on and off. IT was also nice that it came with a wig cap. I really liked wearing it, and I absolutely love it. I would recommend this wig to anyone looking for a blue bob wig. Review Title: Nice quality Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Plant Therapy Natural Acetone Free Nail Polish Remover 6 fl oz One Touch Dispensing Bottle with Flip Top Cap Tropical Flower Scent Review Date: 2021/05/03 Store: Plant Therapy Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Plant Therapy', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '6.24 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 6.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912056168'} Review Text: I didn't like this natural nail polish. It took much more scrubbing and nail pads to remove my nail polish. I also did not like the smell. My nails and nail beds felt very greasy after using this. I liked the dispenser, but I would not get this again. Review Title: Not that effective Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magic Wand Makeup Brushes Set - 5pcs Wizard Wand Makeup Brushes Foundation Blending Blush Eyeshadow Face Lip Powder Brush Beauty Tools (New-Bronze) Review Date: 2020/08/04 Store: rongji jewelry Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'rongji jewelry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, Lip, For Blush, For Setting Powder, For Foundation, Eyebrow', 'Color': 'New-Bronze', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '5', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 3.03 x 1.14 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'makeup brushes', 'UPC': '793610791245', 'Manufacturer': 'YUNXIAN'} Review Text: WOW! I was so surprised when I took these out of the package. They are very sturdy and look amazing. I wasn't expecting them to be as heavy as they were, but they really are pieces of art. There were a few loose hairs, but once those fell out (as most brushes do), they worked great. The carrying case they came with was also very cute. These are perfect for any Harry Potter fan. I am still so happy with how great these are. Review Title: Quality! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Maya Mari Hydrating Argan Oil Shampoo – Rich in Nutrients, Restores Moisture & Shine, 32 oz Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: MAYA MARI Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAYA MARI', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Curly Hair', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 10 inches; 1.94 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'MMAROILSP', 'UPC': '850004068267'} Review Text: I love the pump that this shampoo comes with. It's great to easily add the product to your hand while showering. This is also a nice big size for the price.

The shampoo is a bit watery, but it does lather very nicely and my hair feels smooth and silky after using it. I feel like I can use this everyday without drying out my hair. The shampoo smells really nice and I love the scent - it's not too strong. I had to use maybe two pumps to fully cover my hair while showering. Review Title: Love the pump Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers, 22 Sheets Butterfly Nail Sticker DIY Nail Decals, 2 Set Butterfly Nail Glitter Holographic Stickers Reflected Butterfly Designs for Nails Supply Review Date: 2020/10/24 Store: B bangcool Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Surface Recommendation nail': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Shape Irregular': '', 'Brand': 'B bangcool', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Pattern': 'Insects', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: Overall these stickers are very cute, and they stick on the nail easily. I feel like some of the stickers are very blurry, and it's hard to see what exactly the details are, which is a bit disappointing. The sticker sets also come from different brands, and they have a few different wrappers for each sticker. Review Title: Very cute, some stickers are "blurry" Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/11/06 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: This body wash is very potent and smells great. The pump is easy to use and my skin feels great after using it. There is also a lot of product in this, so I will be getting a lot of use out of it.

This came arrived and the safety cap was cracked, so it leaked out of the top and was a bit of a mess to clean up. There wasn't too much of product loss, but it still was annoying to clean up. Review Title: Smells Great! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Review Date: 2020/12/06 Store: Kneipp Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} Review Text: I have been enjoying this body foam. The smell isn't too overwhelming, and honestly I could use a bit more smell. It foams up really well, and glides on the skin. You can use not a lot and still cover your entire body. It washes off nicely, and you don't really smell it afterward. I have been using this for about a week and the container hasn't rusted or anything either, which is something that tends to happen with products in a metal container. I wish there was a way to know how much was left, so I know when to get a new one, but overall I am happy with this body wash. Review Title: Smells Great, Good Foaming Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2020/12/14 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'} Review Text: I am really impressed with this scrunchie. I have tried to use the invisibobble before, but I have very curly hair and my hair would always get caught in them, even if it did hold my hair up all day. I was so excited to give this a try. It is my new favorite hair accessory. The velvet is very smooth and it grips onto my hair all day. When I take it down, I don't have a very noticeable crease, and it also doesn't tear my hair out. I wish I had 100 of these in every color, I'm now a fan! Review Title: LOVE THIS Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Biutee Nail Stamping Plates 5pcs Templates With Stamper Scraper Set Nail Art Plates set animal flower Christmas halloween design Review Date: 2020/12/27 Store: Biutee Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 5.75 x 1.18 inches; 5.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TOOL-AT-755', 'Manufacturer': 'Biutee'} Review Text: I have tried and tried again for this to work, but I cannot for the life of me figure out how to use this. I have watched videos, tutorials, and spent hours trying these plates to get something, but I can't figure it out. I used different types of nail polishes, waited different amounts of times, and even used a stamper from another set (that also doesn't work) and the nail polish does not go onto the stamper. I feel like I see a lot of videos online of these working, but this is my second set and my second try, and it still does not work for me. Review Title: Did not work Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count Review Date: 2021/01/17 Store: SOOAE Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: I was expecting some larger bubbles than this mask gave me. I kept it on a bit longer than the recommended 3 minutes to see if the bubbles would get any larger, but they didn't. I think it worked well, but I think that the gimmick isn't worth what you get. My face felt pretty good afterward, but it wasn't anything special. This may be cooler to a younger demographic, but I would not get this again. Review Title: Underwhelming Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Steamer with Portable Mini Cold Facial Mister, Face Steamer for Facial Deep Cleaning, Nano Ionic Face Hot Steaming Machine for Home Facials Personal Moisturizing Skincare Beauty Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: ROSEFEAST Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Brand': 'ROSEFEAST', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Cold,Moisturizing,Relaxing,Clean,Aromatherapy', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 7.87 x 4.57 inches; 1.57 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'ROSEFEAST'} Review Text: I absolutely love this little facial steamer. It's a great size, and heats up the water very quickly. I also like the tools that this comes with. I feel like the headband is a touch too small for my head, but it is very cute. After using it, my skin felt hydrated, and it really opened up my pores. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I wish the cord was a bit longer and thinner. I have to use an extension cord to use it at my makeup desk. Review Title: Obsessed Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Avajar Aqua A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women and Men| Moisturizing Face Mask | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack Review Date: 2021/03/03 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: This mask was easy to open and place on my face. The mask also did not slide while on my face. There weren't a lot of flaps that are hard to manage. My skin felt moisturized after using these, and my skin looked very hydrated. I felt that there was enough product on the mask, and it didn't feel overly wet. I would get these again. Review Title: Very moisturizing Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spiral Hair Ties (Gradient Coffee,9 Pcs), Coil Hair Ties for Thick Hair, Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women , No Crease Hair Ties, Phone Cord Hair Ties for all Hair Types with Plastic Spiral Review Date: 2021/03/15 Store: QIUTIMIY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'QIUTIMIY', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '9'} Review Text: I have pretty curly hair and I still haven't gotten these to work. My boyfriend uses this in his very straight hair and he has no issues. It holds his hair, doesn't leave a bump, and he likes how they look overall. I wish I could get these to work for my hair, but I do not have any luck. I'm happy that I have someone who can use it and enjoys it, but it's just not a product for me. Review Title: Not for curly hair Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fascy Facial Mask Beauty Treatment 5 Packs 3 Step Mask, Korean Facial Skincare Mask, All Natural Moisturizing Facial Mask Skin Beauty Treatment with Eye Cream, Skin Rejuvenation Facial Mask Review Date: 2021/03/24 Store: Fascy Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fascy', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Centella Asiatica', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 4.88 x 0.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} Review Text: This packaging is completely in Korean, which is fine, but I wish they included an instruction card for each step. I had to use a translating app to figure out what each pouch was.

The first time I used this product, I used it wrong because I used step 3 first, but that was because there is a big "step 3" on the front of the pouch. My skin felt good after using it the right way, but it's just confusing packaging. The face mask was very difficult to unwrap, which is very frustrating when you are trying to relax with some self care. I don't think I would get these again, but I will use up the rest of the masks that I have. Review Title: A little much Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff Review Date: 2021/05/02 Store: Beeager Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Color': 'Yellow,Gray,White', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Beeager', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 3.98 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Review Text: I was really happy with the performance of this scrunchie stand. It's well made and it holds a lot of scrunchies. I also really like the scrunchies that came with the stand. This would make a perfect gift for anyone that needs an easy way to store scrunchies and hairties. Review Title: Well made Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Short Straight Bob Wigs with Bangs Synthetic 1B/Blue Straight Wigs for Cosplay Wig or Daily Party Use Review Date: 2021/05/02 Store: SENSAIRUITE Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'SENSAIRUITE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '14.44 x 9.99 x 1.92 inches; 7.2 Ounces'} Review Text: I really liked this wig. It looked natural, and it was easy to take on and off. IT was also nice that it came with a wig cap. I really liked wearing it, and I absolutely love it. I would recommend this wig to anyone looking for a blue bob wig. Review Title: Nice quality Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Plant Therapy Natural Acetone Free Nail Polish Remover 6 fl oz One Touch Dispensing Bottle with Flip Top Cap Tropical Flower Scent Review Date: 2021/05/03 Store: Plant Therapy Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Plant Therapy', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '6.24 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2.2 x 2.2 inches; 6.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912056168'} Review Text: I didn't like this natural nail polish. It took much more scrubbing and nail pads to remove my nail polish. I also did not like the smell. My nails and nail beds felt very greasy after using this. I liked the dispenser, but I would not get this again. Review Title: Not that effective Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Beauty and Cosmetics:** High engagement with makeup tools, facial masks, and hair care products, indicating a strong interest in beauty and self-care.
  
- **Quality and Functionality:** Preference for high-quality, sturdy products (e.g., makeup brushes, shampoo) that feel effective and perform well.

- **Aesthetic Appeal:** Strong appreciation for visually appealing items, such as themed beauty tools and elegant packaging (e.g., makeup brushes, wig).

- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Attention to unique, pleasant scents in body washes and shampoos, indicating a preference for sensory experiences in personal care.

- **User Experience:** Valued ease of use (e.g., pump dispensers for shampoos and body washes), suggesting a desire for convenience without compromising quality.

- **Mixed Results with Nail Products:** Experience with nail art products varies, expressing frustration with ineffective items (e.g., nail stamping plates) while enjoying other nail decoration options like stickers.

- **Caring for Hair Type:** Specific interest in products suitable for different hair types, expressing difficulties with certain hair accessories (e.g., spiral hair ties) that do not work well for curly hair.

- **Skincare and Hydration:** Consistent interest in moisturizing products (e.g., masks, body washes) indicates prioritization of hydration in skincare routine.

target_interaction.title: Coating on the makeup
target_interaction.text: There seemed to be like a wax coating on the eyebrow pencil, and I was unable to get any color on my hand while trying to swatch. I wasn't sure how to use the sharpener either, and it didn't really do anything. When I scraped part of the waxy coating off, the color looked to have been good, but the product itself was really sticky. I ended up throwing it out and I would not give this a second chance.
target_interaction.title_meta: COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (03 Deep Brown)
description: Featuring a unique, triangular tip, Brow Definer's retractable pencil design is ideal for outlining and filling your brows in one fluid motion. The custom spooley end is created with a precise width and firmness to seamlessly blend color.
